text.title: Text to Summarize
text.description: The text content you want to summarize.

modelName.title: Model Name
modelName.description: The LLM model to use for summarization (e.g., gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4o, claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022).

systemPrompt.title: Custom System Prompt (Optional)
systemPrompt.description: Optional custom system prompt to guide the summarization. If not provided, a default prompt will be used.

apiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
apiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for accessing the LLM.

chunkSize.title: Chunk Size (Optional)
chunkSize.description: Maximum number of characters per chunk. Default is 4000.

chunkOverlap.title: Chunk Overlap (Optional)
chunkOverlap.description: Number of characters to overlap between chunks. Default is 200.
